sourcesContent:
import {useContext} from "react"; import BookContext from "../../Context/BookContext"; export const Bookedit = () => { const { formValues, onChange, errors} = useContext(BookContext); return (
{errors.title && ({errors.title[0]})}
{errors.author && ({errors.author[0]})}
{errors.publication_year && ({errors.publication_year[0]})}
{errors.ISBN && ({errors.ISBN[0]})}
{errors.no_in_stock && ({errors.no_in_stock[0]})}
) }
